name: 9th International Conference on Research in Business, Management and Economics
content: A must-attend conference in the fields of management, business, and economics – ICRBME – is where you should be. Learn about the biggest trends and technological developments in these academic fields, identify common issues and challenges, and brainstorm probable solutions. Moreover, gain a unique educational experience as our conference will focus on learning without borders and efficient information exchange methods. The past 7th editions of this conference have received wonderful feedback. Attendees joined from countries like Germany, Lithuania, Brazil, Greece, Romania, Poland, Nigeria, Taiwan, Gambia, India, and several others. We will build off the success of our previous events to ensure that this year’s conference is bigger and better than ever. Mark your calendars for the 9th International Conference on Research in Business, Management and Economics, scheduled to take place from December 20 to 22, 2024, in the picturesque city of Berlin, Germany. Interact and immerse in discourse with a host of talented professionals: academics, scholars, researchers, university faculty, scientists, representatives of local and international non-profits, private and public sector personnel, and others. We will cover topics such as international trade and investments, life insurance, female entrepreneurship, economic conference recession, and so much more at this noteworthy event! Don’t miss out on this great experience.
